name: ClassicalKING
0:
”Alexa, open classical king”
”Alexa, play classical king”
”Alexa, ask classical king to listen live”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classical king
des:
Whether you're a lifelong classical music lover or just starting your journey, Classical KING brings you a beautiful selection of music, from inspiring classics to exciting new pieces. Now, with the power of Alexa, you can enjoy this rich library of music effortlessly.
How it works: Just say, “Alexa, open Classical KING” or “Alexa, play Classical KING”, and let the music fill your space. This skill streams directly from Classical KING, so you can enjoy high-quality classical music anytime, anywhere.
Getting started:
1. Ensure you have an Alexa-enabled device, such as an Echo, Echo Dot, or any other Alexa-compatible device.
2. Enable the Classical KING skill by simply saying, “Alexa, enable Classical KING” or by finding the skill in your Alexa app and tapping “Enable.”
3. After enabling, you can start listening by saying, “Alexa, play Classical KING.”
There are no additional accounts or subscriptions required to use this skill. All you need is your Alexa device and a love for classical music!
Enjoy endless streaming of inspiring works and new favorites at your command. Perfect for background listening while you work, relax, or entertain. Classical KING is your gateway to the world of classical music, anytime you want it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
